name: Epic Production Technologies
description: Light and Sound Production for rent
overview: Epic Production Technologies, Inc. provides lighting, rigging, audio, and staging equipment for rentals and production. The company operates in four divisions: Rentals, Production, Sales, and Integration. The Rentals division rents dimming, control, trussing, drapery, and staging equipment. The Production division involves in equipment rental, technical consultation, and staffing for concert tours, theatrical productions, and corporate events. The Integration division offers installations and system integration of technologies. Its clients include theatre and broadcast facilities, entertainment complexes, convention centers, schools and colleges, houses of worship, and themed attractions. Epic Production Technologies, Inc. was formerly known as Ed and Ted’s Excellent Lighting, Inc. and it changed its name in September 2008. Epic Production Technologies, Inc. was founded in 2008 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

funding_rounds.source_description: Epic Production Technologies Receives $1.5M Subordinated Debt Investment
